House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08312
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING DULY APPOINTED JUDGES OF THE METROPOLITAN TRIAL COURT AN INCENTIVE REMUNERATION, HEREIN KNOWN AS HAZARD PAY, EQUIVALENT TO AT LEAST TWENTY PERCENT (20%) OF THEIR BASIC MONTHLY SALARY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to grant hazard pay without tax to Judges of the Metropolitan Trial Court in recognition of their hard work and prompt action on criminal cases that need to be resolved.
